title: T207 Joshua Devore/ Recruit Little Cigars
author: Fish

posts.post_title: T207 Joshua Devore/ Recruit Little Cigars
posts.post_content: I have a Joshua Devore with a recruit little cigars back I am looking to sell! The card is not graded but it looks to be in pretty good shape. I’m not sure what it’s worth so if you’re interested in it please email me at [url]fisher29norris@gmail.com[/url]. I will send pics via email. Thank you! Best offer gets the card!
